title: Minoxidil
overview: Minoxidil is a white to off-white crystalline powder, originally developed as an antihypertensive vasodilator and now widely used as a topical agent for hair regrowth. It stimulates hair follicles by enhancing blood flow to the scalp and prolonging the anagen phase of the hair cycle. Minoxidil is clinically proven to be effective in treating androgenetic alopecia (pattern hair loss) in both men and women, with a well-established safety and efficacy profile across global markets.
features: Clinically proven to promote hair regrowth and slow hair loss
Dual-use: effective in both male and female pattern hair loss
Suitable for a variety of topical formulations including solutions, foams, and sprays
Excellent chemical stability under standard storage
Minimal systemic absorption when used topically

applications.title: Pharmaceutical/Cosmeceutical
applications.description: Widely used as the active component in over-the-counter and prescription-strength topical treatments for androgenetic alopecia and other hair thinning disorders
